Activity: Log in to the OA system, check emails, and prepare for a weekly wrap-up meeting.
Conduct a weekly wrap-up meeting with the entire team to review progress, tackle issues, and reiterate deadlines.
Gather feedback on the week’s production and collaboration protocols from team members during the wrap-up.
Document meeting outcomes and distribute action items to relevant team members.
Reflect on the week's accomplishments and challenges, updating personal notes for next week’s planning.
Set personal goals for the following week, focusing on further project enhancements.
End of the week: Log out from the OA system and wind down, preparing for the next week.
